des: "The parsley is what makes these potatoes green.  This is my mother-in-law's recipe. It is a very fast and easy way to make better-than-mashed potatoes!"
ins: In a large pot combine potatoes, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper.  Pour in enough water to just cover potatoes.  Cover and cook on medium heat for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.  Let stand 10 minutes.
